title: Zabai Norec Partnership
description: The NOREC Preparatory Training held in Kathmandu, was a six-day immersive experience focused on enhancing the skills and knowledge of participants involved in international development projects.

title: A Humatarian Alarm in Cox's Bazar
description: Exploring the challenges faced by Rohingya refugees in Bangladesh and the urgent need for sustainable solutions to address their plight.

title: Zabai And Swisscontact ASTHA, aiming to empower Community Paramedics
description: A collaborative initiative between Zabai and Swisscontact ASTHA to enhance the skills and capabilities of community paramedics, ultimately improving healthcare access in underserved regions.
